title: I want to study in South Korea and I am in 9th standard. Are there any scholarships for me at this level? - Quora
tags: College and University Scholarship and Fellowships

response.answer_text: Hmmm im not really sure about the education system in korea but i know that you can get a scholarship in university and they do offer for high school but the ones i know About are through organizations im assuming you are amarican so you could check this website and they have all the scholarships listed 8+ High/Secondary School Scholarships in Korea, South 2020-21 [Updated] if there’s anything you don’t know don’t hesitate to contact me and I’ll help you
